previewText: I was born on the slopes of Mount Emberstare during an eclipse, when the moon turned as red as blood.
benefit: You substitute your highest ability score for Constitution to determine your initial hit points.
flavor: The circumstances of your birth were somehow blessed, and you grew up knowing you were somehow set apart and special. Who regards your birth as auspicious? Are you tied to a specific prophecy, and if so, what does it say? How were you treated differently as a child?Good Background: Cleric.
name: Auspicious Birth
